org.eventchain

Class MemoryJournal

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractService
      • org.eventchain.MemoryJournal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service, Journal

    public class MemoryJournal
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractService
implements Journal
    Memory-based Journal implementation. Not meant to be used in production.
